channel.title: Customer Service on
channel.description: Recent content in Customer Service on

item.title: NetApp – Customer Service WIN!
item.description: I just wanted to share my NetApp customer service experience since usually people only share negative experiences. I needed to download a mib for a NetApp today. I really don’t like that I have to register an account just to download a mib but whatever. I was really upset after registering the account and entering a system-id to find that I didn’t have access to download any mibs. I saw that feedback button glaring at me so decided to give it a shot, left a “very dissatisfied” about download experience review.
